messages.content:
Current date: Tuesday, 08 October 2024

Each response line matches the following format:
FIELD identifier^^^value

Give a response with the following lines only, with values inferred from USER_DATA:

FIELD 
USER_DATA: Subject: Meeting Request with John Doe
From: Constantine <Constantine@aitrailblazer.com>
To: Constantine <Constantine@aitrailblazer.com>
Attendees: Constantine <john@doe.com>, Constantine <Constantine@aitrailblazer.com>
Received: 10/8/2024 3:33 PM

Body:
Hi Constantine, I would like to schedule a 30-minute meeting to discuss the Q3 Marketing Strategy.Are you available next Tuesday at 3:00 PM? Best regards, John Doe
^^^value
END_RESPONSE

Do not explain how the values were determined.
For fields without corresponding data in USER_DATA, use 'NO_DATA'.

USER_DATA: Subject: Meeting Request with John Doe
From: Constantine <Constantine@aitrailblazer.com>
To: Constantine <Constantine@aitrailblazer.com>
Attendees: Constantine <john@doe.com>, Constantine <Constantine@aitrailblazer.com>
Received: 10/8/2024 3:33 PM

Body:
Hi Constantine, I would like to schedule a 30-minute meeting to discuss the Q3 Marketing Strategy.Are you available next Tuesday at 3:00 PM? Best regards, John Doe
